ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors acknowledge Stéphane Grégoire and Lucy Martine (Inra, Dijon, France) for fatty acids and tocopherols analyses, Emmanuelle Camus-Prost (Laboratoire Spiral, Couternon, France) for polyphenols analysis, and Philippe Durand (Laboratoire Spiral, Couternon, France) for the KRL test.
